name: Diari Demo
description:
Diari is a 2D platformer with many interesting mechanics extending from genres such as souls-likes to modern day metroidvania's and platformers.  You take upon the adventure of Aimacra, who seemingly finds herself in a library. Bound of your curiosity, Aimacra and you travel through the labyrinth to unveil the secrets of the world and find your friend Sirestias.

Discord if interested in development or want to hang out in our community!

https://discord.gg/admUnCkvCU
